Job Summary - City Coordinator

Assist the mayor in the day-to-day operation of city business.  Responsible to the Mayor and City Council for the proper administration of all city affairs.  Provide executive leadership to various boards and commissions, including but not limited to White Oak Economic Development Corporation, White Oak Planning and Zoning Commission, White Oak Board of Adjustments.

![](https://www.cityofwhiteoak.com/api/blob/viewBlob?i=YusEL%252B1fJxc6Lk2N1diNRziLCbTCckaAYWDO72qJ8EnTdMFbVI78xYUQJ5aBitzJ&s=large)
906 S. White Oak Road, White Oak, TX 75693
[(903) 759-3936](tel:9037593936)
|
